rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chen por 'gyur ro/ /mar me 'dzin pa de rnams kyang 'di'i rig pa 'dzin pa grub par 'gyur ro/ /lhan cig spyod pa de rnams dang /
thabs gcig tu ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rnam par rgyu zhing rang dgar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur gyis mngon par
dgyes par 'gyur ro/ /mthar yang sangs rgyas nyid du nges par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang / las kyi cho ga'i sgrub thabs dam par gyur pa ni/ chu klung 'gram mam rgya mtsho'i ngogs/ /
de bzhin kha ba can gyi rir/ /ri yi rgyal po'i 'bigs byed de/ /der ni las mchog bsgrub par bya/ /sa h+ye ma la ya nyid dang / /ri bo spos kyi ngad ldang dang / /bya rgod phung po'i ri rgyal
du/ /las kyi mchog ni bsgrub par bya/ /rgya mtsho chen po'i brag dang ni/ /shing sogs me tog ldan pa ste/ /rgyal bas gsungs pa'i sngags rnams ni/ /phyogs 'di rnams su
bsgrub par bya/ /rnam par dben pa'i phyogs gtsang ma/ /bas mtha' grong pa'i chos bzhi la/ /mi smra reg pa spangs nas ni/ /rtag tu gci ba bya ba yin/ /lus la lhag gnas
bshang ba dang / /brtul zhugs can dag gtsang sbra bya/ /reg na gzhon sha can rnams 'dod/ /srog chags spangs pa'i sa rnams ni/ /gsum pa de bzhin blangs nas ni/ /
rtag pa kho nar bshang lam la'o/ /de bzhin gnyis ka'i mthar lag pa/ /sngags pas rtag tu sa dag ni/ /sngar bstan pa dag blangs nas ni/ /zlos
pas rtag tu rkang pa nyid/ /g.yas dang de las gzhan pa ni/ /phan tshun nyid du kun bzhag nas/ /'bad pas rkang pa bkru bar bya/ /rgya cher sngar ni brjod pa bzhin/ /sngags
zlos po yi gtsang sbra yang / /dri nga med pa'i gtsang sbra ste/ /rtag tu thub pa nyid kyis gsungs/ /'di dag mdor bsdus bstan pa yin/ /rgyud rnams kun tu mthong ngo zhes/ /mnga'
bdag thub pa nyid kyis gsungs/ /de nas zlos pos nye reg bya/ /sdom brtson dngos grub las la dga'/ /sngar brjod pa yi cho ga yis/ /yid kyi nang gi dag pa yin/ /gtsang
sbra rnam pa lnga ru brjod/ /sngags pas sngags rnams thams cad du/ /lus kyi gtsang sbra de bzhin du/ /ngag yid kho nar rab tu bsgrags/ /bzhi pa bden pa'i gtsang sbra
ste/ /chu ni lnga par brjod par bya/ /bden pa'i chos ni khro ba thul/ /rgyud shes bstan bcos mthong ba dang / /phra mo'i de nyid don la mkhas/ /sngags shes las la grags
pa dang / /rgyu yis nad la mkhas pa ste/ /de la dngos grub rnyed mi dka'/ /bden pa'i chos ni rnam spangs ba'i/ /brdzun pa'i tshig ni smra mi bya/ /bden pa thams cad rnam
spangs pa'i/ /ma rungs rab tu ma rungs nyid/ /rnam par sdang dang 'khrugs bcas dang / /rtsub cing gnad ni 'gems pa dang / /bden pa'i chos ni rnam par nyams/ /sems
can gzhan la gdung bar byed/ /phra ma nyon mongs can sems dang / /chos rnams thams cad spangs pa dang / /de bzhin 'tshe ba'i bdag nyid can/ /rtag tu khrims 'chal chos
min spyod/ /sngags zlos pa yis spang bar bya/ /de bzhin nyid du grong gi chos/ /khro ba brnab sems 'byung ba yi/ /'jig rten pha rol 'jigs pa rnams/ /blo ldan rang rgyal bse ru
dang / /slar yang rtag tu nyon mongs dang / /sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis smad/ /de bzhin rtag tu brdzun smra ba/ /'jig rten dngos grub 'dod don gnyer/ /sa steng brdzun sma nye bar
smra/ /mi bzad dmyal ba chen por ltung / /sngon gyis nyes pa las de bzhin/ /dga' bas gshin rje'i 'jig rten du/ /rtag tu slar yang der gnas so/ /rtag tu brdzun smras nyer 'tsho
ba/ /mi bzad ngan 'gror ltung bar 'gyur/ /thig nag rab tu tsha ba dang / /yang sos ral gri lo ma dang / /de bzhin shal ma la yi nags/ /der ni bskal pa mang por gnas/ /
brdzun du smra ba'i skye bo ni/ /gsang sngags log par smra ba dang / /rmongs pas log par brjod pa yi/ /'byung po rnams la slu byed pa/ /de la grub pa ga la yod/ /de phyir rmongs
pa las 'di yi/ /sngags kyi dngos grub ma mthong nas/ /sngags pa'i dngos grub med do zhes/ /'di skad du ni tshig smra pa/ /gang gis sangs rgyas
bstan pa ni/ /sa stengs 'dir ni rab spangs pa/ /bskal ba bye ba mang po yis/ /de yis grub par ga la 'gyur/ /de phyir 'di ni mi bzad pa'i/ /'jigs chen mnar med
'tshed par 'gyur/ /yang sos dang ni thig nag dang / /rab tu tsha bar 'tshed pa dang / /sems can sdig sbrul la sogs pa/ /sbangs pa'i sa phyogs 'dod par bya/ /'bras bu me
tog yang dag ldan/ /dri med chu ni rab bsngags pa/ /sngags rig pas ni sngags bsnyen bya/ /yul gzhan rnams su bsgrags mi bya/ /lha yi gnas sam dur khrod dam/ /
brtan pa'i mtshan ma gcig pa dang / /rtags gcig de bzhin bas mtha' ru/ /sngags rig sngags ni bsnyen pa bya/ /bdag dang grogs rnams bsrung byas nas/ /sngar
spyad gsang sngags ldan pa dang / /sngags pas rtag tu sngags bzlas bya/ /dgon pa che mchog shing chen dang / /me tog 'bras bu la sogs 'byung / /ri yi rtse dang khung bu
dang / /chu yi gnas ni gtsang mar bcas/ /'bab chu che 'gram yid 'ong bar/ /sngags rig pas ni sngags bsnyen bya/ /sngags shes nas ni nges rtogs byed/ /shar
phyogs su yang chu klung che/ /lu hi ta 'gram dge ba dang / /de bzhin kA ma ru pa'i yul/ /grong mchog 'phel bar byed pa dang / /dma' ba gang du 'di 'gro mchog /'dug pa dang ni
chu klung mchog /gnas der rtag tu zlos pa dang / /gtsang ma blo gros ldan pas bsten/ /sngon du bsnyen pa'ang der gyis shig /gang gA'i sgo ru las rnams kun/ /de bzhin rtag tu gang gA
dang / /dug can pa ni phrad pa ru/ /rab tu sbyor ba kun nyid dang / /gtsang ma'i sngags kyis bzlas pa bya/ /dur khrod che dang gzhan nyid ni/ /zlos pos der ni rtag tu bzlas/ /dri med chu
dang 'bab chu ni/ /srog chags rnams kyis spangs pa ru/ /de nyid phyir ni shin tu ni/ /mnyam gzhag sngags kyis bzlas pa bya/ /der ni 'jig rten bsam pa yi/ /bsod nams min
ba cung zad mthong / /'on kyang sngags kyis nyer bstan pas/ /cung zad dus su 'dug par bya/ /de nas gzhan du 'gro bar bya/ /zla ba gzas zin dus der ni/ /dus ma bab na'ang
dus cung zad/ /der 'dug bya yi gzhan du min/ /gzhan du sngags rig ci nus pas/ /de nas myur du 'gro bar bya/ /bde gshegs mchod rten bzhugs pa yi/ /sa steng rnams
su kun tu 'dug /'jig rten mu stegs thams cad ni/ /lta ba ngan bar lhung ba rnams/ /mu stegs can gzhan gnas rnams ni/ /sngags rig pas ni rtag tu spang / /sngags
shes der ni mi bsdad do/ /skyes mchog blo gros rgyu ngan pa/ /rgyal ba mchog gis gang bzhugs dang / /rang rgyal bse ru lta bu dang / /byang chub
sems dpa' bskal ba che/ /rgyal mchog sras po nyan thos rnams/ /de rnams kun bzhugs sa steng gi /yul rnams kun tu sngags shes pas/ /'bad pas sngon du bsnyen pa
bya/ /mnyam par gzhag pas gsang sngags ni/ /gnas de ru ni bzlas par bya/ /gsungs pa'i gnas ni 'di rnams su/ /gsungs pa'i las rnams thams cad dang / /las
kyi cho ga'i sgrub thabs rnams/ /'di rnams rnyed par ma gyur na/ /gang yang rung ba'i gnas der ni/ /gtsang mas sngon du bsnyen pa bya/ /dad cing mos pas sgrub thabs kyi/ /cho
ga mchog gi las brtsam mo/ /dang po re zhig bris sku'i thu bo zhal nub tu bstan nas bzhag ste bdag nyid shar du mngon par phyogs la grog mkhar gyi sa'am/ gang gA'i
klung gi 'gram gyi sa blangs nas bu shel rtse dang / tsan+dan dkar po dang / gur gum dang / ga pur rnams bsres la rma bya'i gzugs byas te de bris sku'i spyan sngar bzhag
nas rtse mo ma bcad pa'i ku sha gtsang ma'i phyogs nas byung bas 'khor lo'i rnam pa byas nas bris sku'i spyan sngar lag pa g.yas pas bzung ste lag pa g.yon pas
ni rma bya'o/ /dkar po'i zla ba nya ba'i mtshan phyed na bris sku la mchod pa chen po byas nas ga pur gyis bdug pa bsregs pa'i dri dang / ji srid nam langs pa'i bar de srid du bzlas
par bya'o/ /de nas nyi ma 'char ba'i dus kyi tshe de rma bya'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /'khor lo'ang 'bar ro/ /bdag nyid lha'i phreng ba dang / gos 'chang zhing rnam par brgyan pa dang / nyi ma
'char ka 'dra bar 'dod pa'i gzugs can du sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas te ras ris la bskor ba byas la ras ris blangs nas rma bya'i
gdan de la 'dug na yud tsam gyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten las 'da' bar byed do/ /rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor ba'i rig 'dzin gyi
rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur/ bskal pa drug cu'i bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar 'dod par 'gro zhing rab tu spyod par 'gyur ro/ /thogs pa med par 'gro'o/ /
lha'i phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nyid 'di'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du
'gyur ro/ /mthar yang sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du dbyig pa dang / ril ba spyi blugs dang / mchod phyir thogs dang / ldong ros dang / gi wang dang /
ral gri dang / lcags mda' dang / mtshon rtse gcig pa dang / dgra sta dang / mtshon cha'i khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ sa'i rang bzhin gyi khyad
par dang / rkang gnyis pa dang / rkang bzhi pa dang / bya dang / bzhon pa'i khyad par seng ge dang / stag dang / gzig la sogs pa rnams grog mkhar gyi sa dri zhim po'i
dri zhim bsres pa las byas pa'am/ stan dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / gdugs dkar po dang / cod pan dang / rgyan gyi bye brag thams cad dang / rin po che'i
bye brag thams cad dang / rab tu byung ba'i yo byad kyi bye brag thams cad la bgrang phreng dang / mchil lham dang / lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / khab dang / gri la
sogs pa rgyal gyi lcags las byas pa'am/ gzhan yang gang cung zad sems can gyi yo byad snod la sogs pa rgyal gyi lcags las byas pa'am/ grog mkhar gyi
sa'am/ chu klung gi sa las byas pa de thams cad pa'i rnam lngas bkrus nas mngon par bsang gtor byas te snga ma bzhin du sbyong ba'i sngags sam/ yi ge gcig pa'i
sngags sam/ sngags gzhan gang yang rung ba brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas nas rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir gsungs pa ma gtogs pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'i rig
pa ji ltar 'dod pa dang / ji ltar mngon par dga' bas bdag nyid srung zhing grogs po yongs su bskyab par byas pa/ shin tu gsang thub cing sngags dang / rgyud shes pa/ sngar
bstan pa'i gnas su bris sku zhal nub tu bstan la bzhag ste bdag nyid sngar bzhin du'o/ /bris sku la mchod pa chen po byas nas gtso bor ga bur gyi bdug pa bsregs te sngar bstan
pa'i mtshon cha dang / yo byad dang / sems can gyi khyad pa rnams sngar bstan pa'i bcos mar byas la yar ngo'i zla ba nya ba'i mtshan mo rdzas de rnams gang rung blangs te mtshan mo ji
srid du bzlas pa byas na nyi ma 'char ba'i dus kyi tshe bar skabs 'dir bris sku la 'od zer gyi phreng ba chen po kun tu mthong ngo / /gal te sgrub pa po bzhon pa'i khyad par blangs par gyur
na de la zhon nas ji ltar 'dod par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te rgyan gyi khyad par ram/ mtshon cha'i khyad par blangs pa'am/ bcang pas rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po chen por 'gyur
ro/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin 'gro zhing lha'i lus can nyi ma shar ba dang mtshungs pa 'od zer chen po'i phreng ba dang ldan pa glog ltar gsal ba'i sku/ rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad
kyi mnga' bdag /ring du 'tshe zhing bskal pa chen por gnas pa/ rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor/ lha'i nor bu rin po che'i gzhal
yas khang na spyod pa/ sngar yongs su brtags pa'i sa'i rang bzhin gyi bzhon pa gang gis grub pa de nyid mthu chen por 'gyur te de nyid 'di'i bzhon pa dang /
de nyid 'di'i grogs po ste gzhan gyi sngags kyi dngos grub bzlog par gyur pa bdag gi sngags kyi dngos grub kun tu sbyar bar byas pa/ byams pa'i bdag nyid can/ phan par 'dod
pa rtag tu rjes su bcings pa/ de nyid 'di'i mtshon cha dang / rgyan dang / rin po che'i bye brag dang / stan dang / mal cha dang / sems can la sogs pa gang yin pa de nyid 'di'i
bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbya ba chen po rtag tu rjes su 'brel bar 'gyur ro/ /mthu chen po dang / brtson 'grus chen po dang / lus chen por 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan
ras gzigs mngon sum du mthong zhing legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste spyi bor byugs nas ji srid byang chub snying po rjes su thob kyi bar du dge ba'i bshes gnyen mdzad de stobs
bcu po rnams nges par kun nas thob ste mchod pa'i 'os su'ang 'gyur ro/ /sems can rnams kyis zil gyis mi non pa dang / 'byung po thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur
ro/ /yang dag pa'i mtha'i rigs rgyan mi gcod pa dang / sa thob par yang 'gyur ro/ /stobs bcu dang / byang chub sems dpa' nyid du nges pa dang / ting nge 'dzin du 'gyur
mdor bsdus na las mchog thams cad dang / gnas mchog la gnas pas ras ris mchog gi spyan sngar mchod pa mchog la mngon par dga' bas las mchog gzhan nyid
bya'o/ /rig pa 'dzin pa nyid nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / sa rjes su thob par byed pa nyid dang / lus 'di
nyid kyis 'jig rten kun tu 'gro ba nyid dang / stobs bcu'i rgyud yongs su rdzogs par byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang / 'phags pa byams pa mngon sum du mthong ba nyid kyi phyir dang / chos
bstan pa don yod pa nyid kyi phyir dang / sangs rgyas gdung rgyun mi gcod pa nyid kyi phyir dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kun tu gnon cing rjes su thob par byed pa nyid kyi phyir
dang / chos kyi sprin rnam par 'byor pa la rjes su 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir dang / nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba med cing bdud rtsi'i char gyi rgyun gyis rab tu zhi ba nyid kyi phyir dang /
'jig rten rjes su 'dzin pa la rab tu 'jug cing nan tan byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul srung ba nyid kyi phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung
don yod par byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang / sngags kyi spyod pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rab tu sgom pa nyid kyi phyir dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos bdag nyid chen po rnams 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di bsgrub par bya ste sngags kyi
mtha' rab 'byams dang ldan pa ras ris thu bo spyan snga dang nye bar 'dug nas 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad sngags kyi cho ga dang / rgyud thams cad
du rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i lam ste mdor na 'dir rtog pa gzhan du gsungs pa'i las rnams kyis kyang ras ris kyi rgyal po 'di bsgrub par bya ste myur du de rnams kyi dngos
grub tu 'gyur te gang ngas bstan pa de dag gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde bcom
ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral ba gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i cho ga las/ ras ris mchog gi sgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa rdzogs so// //de nas bcom
ldan 'das shAkya thub pa slar yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de la gzigs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po la bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po/ khyod
kyi ras ris kyi cho ga'i sgrub thabs bar ma yod do/ /de mdor bsdus nas bshad par bya yi/ legs par yid la gyis shig dang bshad par bya'o/ /de nas yang byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ston pa 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba
can/ sems can thams cad la phan par dgyes pa/ bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i don dang / ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams la gzigs nas gang de'i dus la bab par dgongs
na de gsung du gsol/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
stsal to/ /sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /dang po re zhig tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs dang / gtsang sbra'i kun tu spyod pa dang / nges par sdom pa dang / bzlas pa dang /
sbyin sreg dang / bsam gtan dang / cho ga dang / gang du rab tu gnas pa ste sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa sgrub pa'i las 'bras bu dang bcas shing don med par mi 'gyur
ba dang / sngags thams cad kyi rab tu sbyar ba'i dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ba de gang zhe na/ de ngas bshad kyi sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /dang po re zhig rig pa'i
brtul zhugs dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blang ba dang po nyid du yang dag par blangs te/ dang po re zhig dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis nye bar bstan pa'i dam tshig
la yang dag par rjes su 'jug par bya'o/ /khyod kyis rtog pa'i rgyal po gsungs pa/ sngar nges par bstan pa gsal ba/ yid gzhungs pa dang
ldan pa/ slob dpon du dbang bskur ba thob ba/ khyod kyis bstan pa'i cho ga shes pa/ mkhas pa/ gsal ba/ chos dang ldan pa/ bden par smra ba/ spro ba che ba/ byas pa gzo
ba/ brtan pa/ sems bzang ba/ ha cang mi rgan cing ha cang mi gzhon pa/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti thams cad la 'dod pa med pa/ tshangs par spyod pa/ snying rje dang ldan pa/
rnyed pa tsam gyis sam/ longs spyod rgyur ram/ rjes su chags pa'i rgyur yang brdzun mi smra na shin tu chung ngu tsam nyid dang / rnyed pa dang / rmongs pa'i rnam pa lta smos/ dam
bcas pa brtan pa dang / 'byung po thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du snying brtse ba dang ldan pa dang / sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / sngar spyad pa byas pa/ khyod kyis gsang ba'i
rig pa dang / sngags rjes su zlos pa dang / rig pa sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa/ khyod kyi dkyil 'khor du yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'jig rten shes pa/ yang dag par rjes su
'dzin par byed pa/ 'bras bu dang ldan zhing mkhas pa/ legs pa la rab tu zhugs pa/ mi 'jigs shing mi gnod la/ chags pa med pa/ dbang ba/ brtson 'grus
brtan pa/ nang med pa ste/ nad gang gis las su mi rung ba'i ngang tshul can dang / rigs che zhing mtho bar rab tu skyes pa zhes pa/ yon tan 'di rnams dang ldan pa ni dkyil 'khor
gyi slob dpon du 'gyur te sgrub pa po'ang de dang 'dra ba'am/ yan lag cung zad ma rdzogs pa'o/ /de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon la mchod pa byas nas 'di la don du gsol
ba gdab par bya ste/ slob dpon gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rig pa dang / sngags dang / bcom ldan 'das ma de'i dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig la rjes su
'jug par 'tshal na bdag cag la rjes su brtse ba'i don dang / phan pa'i thugs bskyed nas de slob dpon gyis gsung du gsol/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis sngar
bstan pa'i cho gas slob ma ji lta ba bzhin rim gyis brtags nas bzhugs par bya zhing sngar bzhin du mngon par dbang bskur ba byin nas rig pa dang / sngags byin la rim pa ji
lta bar dam tshig bstan par bya'o/ /gsang chen dang / phyag rgya dang / rgyud dang / sngags dang / las rnams kyang dus ring mo nyid nas yongs su brtags te bsam pa shes
nas rgyud dang / sngags la sogs pa dang / las rnams thams cad bstan par bya'o/ /gzhan du ma yin no zhes pa'i cho ga 'di rab tu bsgrags so/ /de nas slob mas
dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon la ji ltar nus pas gang gis slob dpon dgyes pa'am/ bdag nyid dang / longs spyod kyang dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas
dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon des bu'i 'du shes nye bar gzhag par bya'o/ /bu bzhin du bskyang bar bya'o/ /ma bzhin longs spyod kyis nye bar bsdu bar bya'o/ /de nas sgrub po
des rig pa dang / sngags gang yang rung ba zhig bzung nas mtha' gcig tu song ste sngar bstan pa'i gnas rgya cher gong ma bzhin du sbyar bas rig pa la sogs pa de rnams
nyid kyis spyan drang ba dang / gshegs su gsol ba dang / mar me dang / dri dang / bdug pa dang / gtor ma dang / lha bshos dag dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa'i cho ga
nyid kyis rgyas par byas te spyan drangs nas gdan phul ba thun mtshams gsum du khrus gsum bya zhing gos lan gsum brjes te nyi ma so so la bzlas par bya'o/ /de la
thun mtshams kyi dus zhes bya ba ni mtshan mo'i mtha' nas brtsams te ji srid nyi ma 'char ba'i dus tsam gyi bar 'di la dang por bshad do/ /nyi ma gung ni nyi ma shar
ba'i mthar dus tsam gyi tshad kyi mtshams nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nam mkha' la yang dag par brten pa ni cho ga shes pas gung gi thun mtshams su shes par bya'o/ /
nub pa'i dus su'ang lhag ma bzhi cha tsam thun mtshams gsum par brjod par bya'o/ /slob dpon mkhas pa bshes gnyen can/ /tshul khrims brtul zhugs yang dag ldan/ /chen
po'i rigs su 'khrungs pa dang / /kun nas brtson 'grus brtan pa ni/ /sngags dang rgyud sogs yang dag ldan/ /bya ba kun la blo gros byed/ /phra zhing mkhas la tshad shes pa/ /chos
kyi dbyings ni rtag tu 'dzin/ /spro ba che zhing gzi brjid ldan/ /'jig rten chos la ltos pa med/ /thub pa mchog gi chos la dad/ /'jig rten pa rnams dor ba dang / /bzlas pa bya
zhing rnam dben byas/ /sngon du bsnyen pa rjes brten pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gsang sngags shes/ /de las gzhan pa'i rkyen rnams mthong / /sangs rgyas kyis gsungs
gsang sngags dang / /'jig rten pa yi rab sbyor shes/ /srung ba byas shing mthu brtan pa/ /gtsang sbra'i kun spyod la rtag dga'/ /sangs rgyas nye bstan lam la ni/ /kun nas
rjes su 'jug pa dang / /gsang sngags rgyal bas gsungs pa yin/ /gsang sngags zlos la rtag tu brtson/ /rtag tu mthong chos 'bras bu dang / /'jig rten pha rol de bzhin
nyid/ /sdig pa kun la 'jigs pa dang / /phra mo tsam la 'ang de bzhin no/ /gtsang zhing mkhas la le lo med/ /yid gzhungs lta na sdug pa dang / /stobs bcu pas bshad
sngags gang dang / /de bzhin kho nar rgyal sras dang / /'jig rten pa yi sngags gang nyid/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs dag la'ang / /de la rtag tu ngal
bar byas/ /gzhung dang bstan bcos don 'dzin pa/ /nad med nus pa med min pa/ /rga dang nad ni rnam par spangs/ /de bzhin ba shes gnyen can sngags grub/ /kun
nas myur du byed pa dang / /mtha' yi ring min zhing de bzhin/ /tshangs par spyod cing shes rab che/ /khyad par du ni shes pa dang / /gcig tu 'du 'dzi med pa dang / /dpa' zhing
dbang bskur thob pa dang / /de 'dir byang chub pha rol son/ /srid pa zhi bar byed la brtson/ /de bzhin nyid du rig sngags byas/ /mthu chen 'jig rten shes pa dang / /'gro
ba sems can rjes sems pa/ /dpa' nyid dang ni rab tu ldan/ /sbyin dang 'byung bo phan la dga'/ /de bzhin khyad 'phags slob dpon la/ /rtag tu gsol ba gdab par
bya/ /des ni dkyil 'khor bris pa yi/ /sngags kyi dngos grub ster bar byed/ /de nyid kyis ni dbang bskur gyi/ /'bras bu chen po sbyin par 'gyur/ /dngos grub 'dod pa'i
slob mas kyang / /thub pa bzhin du rtag tu mchod/ /de yi gsung ni mi 'gom pa/ /slob mas 'bad pas bya ba yin/ /ji ltar 'byor cing bdog pa yi/ /longs spyod de la
dbul bar bya/ /nyung du tsam mam mang yang rung / /gang gi mnyes par 'gyur ba dang / /lus ni 'tsho ba'i rgyu yi phyir/ /pha la nor ni ster ba ltar/ /de bzhin slob ma chos shes pas/ /
slob dpon la ni nor dbul bya/ /mtha' yi dbang phyug dngos grub thob/ /tshe dang de bzhin nad med dang / /rgyas pa'i 'gro ba thob par 'gyur/ /slob mas bla ma de mchod na/ /de yi
sngags rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /lam dang cho ga nyer mthong dang / /bsnyen pa las kyang brten pa las/ /de bzhin ri mor byas mchod las/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes
par 'gyur/ /de bzhin rgyal mchog sras rnams dang / /lha rnams thams cad dgyes par 'gyur/ /bla ma rtag tu bsnyen bkur na/ /bla ma sngags rnams mthong ba yi/ /'di dag
thams cad brtan par 'gyur/ /sgrub pos ston dang thog mar ni/ /dam tshig la ni rjes 'jug bya/ /dman rnams de dag mnyam yang rung / /gal te ches mchog gyur pa yang / /
rmongs pa'am lhag par khro ba yis/ /rtag tu bla ma brnyas mi bya/ /des kyang rgyud 'dir de la ni/ /man ngag rtag tu sbyin par bya/ /gang tshe sngags kyi dngos grub byin/ /'dis ni
ser sna byas pa min/ /sngar bstan slob ma de la ni/ /man ngag rtag tu sbyin par bya/ /gang tshe sngags kyi dngos grub byin/ /lus can zhen pa 'phel byed pa'i/ /mig ni gang
la yod gyur pa/ /de nyid slob ma nyid bya'o/ /slob dpon 'am ni slob ma'i rgyur/ /phan tshun rjes su 'jug byed pa/ /gang du zhen pa'i rgyun skyong pa/ /'jam
po'i rgyun ni 'dzin pa ste/ /de la sngags ni sbyin par bya/ /slob dpon de bzhin slob ma ni/ /slob ma bla mar mthong ba la/ /rtag tu spro bar 'gyur ba 'am/ /gnyis kas dngos
grub yang dag 'byor/ /de la rtag tu lam nyid dang / /sngags kyi spyod pa rjes bstan bya/ /gnyis kas pha dang bur shes pas/ /sngags ni 'bras bcas rjes 'jug pa/ /brtan
dang dga' ba de bzhin thob/ /rtag tu slob mas bla ma ni/ /rab tu 'bad pas bsrung bar bya/ /bu ni bdag nyid chen po rnams/ /sangs rgyas chos rgyun mi 'chang 'gyur/ /de med
mgon med de rnams la/ /ji skad gsungs pa'i sngags rnams sbyin/ /sems can bkren dang ma ning la'ang / /thams cad la ni khyad par du/ /sngags kyi sbyod pa khyad par
du/ /sngags kyi spyod pa khyad par 'phags/ /tha ma mchog dang bar ma la/ /dus rnams kun tu bya ba'o/ /yongs su thob pa'i chos rnams la/ /rjes su gzung ba'i rgyun
bya'o/ /'gro ba blo gros nges pa yi/ /'dod pa rnams la'ang rab sbyin bya/ /de phyir ji ltar 'dod pa'i sngags/ /slob ma nyid kyis blang bar bya/ /de nyid kyis ni nyer bstan
pas/ /lam nyid yin no gzhan du min/ /dngos grub 'dod pas gang de la/ /pha ni pha rol song ba na/ /pha bzhin mgo bos phyag byas te/ /de nas ji ltar 'dod par 'gro/ /de nas
'dir ni song nas ni/ /mnyam par bzhag pas gsang sngags bzlas/ /slong mo slong ba'i rjes 'jug cing / /smra ba bcad de dus gsum bzlas/ /de ltar bstan pa nyid du 'gyur/ /ji lta'i
lam la rab 'jug pa/ /de tshe rnam 'gyur de gcod pa/ /khang stong dang ni dgon pa che/ /ri bo che dang chu klung ngogs/ /gtsang dang ba lang gnas mtsho chen/ /rnam dben skye bo sbangs pa
bsten/ /lha khang dang ni shing drung dang / /mtshan gcig ri ni mthon po dang / /rgya mtsho che 'gram nyams dga' dang / /chu gling ngam ni gling rnams dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs sngar bstan
pa'i/ /yul rnams sna tshogs yid 'ong ba/ /'di rnams las kyang phyogs gzhan du/ /mnyam par bzhag pas sngags bzlas bya/ /grogs po mtshan nyid ldan pa ni/ /sngags
don nges pa'i rtog ge ba/ /ltas ni rnam pa de nyid shes/ /dpa' zhing g.yul las rnam rgyal ba/ /snying stobs ldan zhing bzod pa can/ /dad dang tshul khrims phun tshogs
ldan/ /rgyal bas gsungs pa'i yul 'dir ni/ /rab bsngags mtshan nyid dang ldan pa/ /bzod dang ldan pa'i grogs po yis/ /'bad pa med pa'i nyin gyis ni/ /las rnams rgyal
ba 'grub par 'gyur/ /tho rangs mal nas langs nas ni/ /'bab chu mtsho chen las byung ba'i/ /srog chags med cing dri ma med/ /chu de nyid la khrus
byas nas/ /sa dang ba byung phye ma yis/ /sngags shes lus ni dril phyis bya/ /de nas sngags kyis sbyang byas pa'i/ /chu nyid shin tu dri med la/ /zlos po brtson pas khrus bya 'o/ /ha
cang yun ring khrus mi bya/ /de nas langs la lag pa dag /sa dag gis kyang bkru bar bya/ /bdun dang bdun dang yang lan bdun/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig nye reg bya/ /yang der so
shing kun tu spyad/ /so sbyangs nas ni dor bar bya/ /de nas skyob la phyag byas shing / /'jig rten mgon la phyag byas nas/ /sngags rig mchod pa yid 'ong bya/ /bya ba sna tshogs
bstod mchod kyis/ /yang dag yang du yang dag bstod/ /de bzhin dri zhim me tog gis/ /ston pa skyob la mchod yon dbul/ /sangs rgyas rnams la mgos phyag byas/ /de
tshe slob mar gyur pa rnams/ /'jig rten mgon po de rnams kyi/ /spyan snga nyid du sdig pa bshags/ /bdag nyid ngag kyang phul byas nas/ /ras ris spyan sngar 'khod par bya/ /
ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug /sngags rig gnyis ka 'dug nas ni/ /mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin te/ /der ni bgrang phreng nyid kyis ni/ /rab tu 'bad pas bzlas pa bya/ /de
tshe sngags gzhan mi bzlas so/ /cho ga dman pa yang spang zhing / /ha cang mchog kyang de bzhin no/ /bar ma bar ma'i las dag la/ /brtul zhugs can dag sngags bzlas bya/ /ha
cang mthon po spang bar bya/ /gal te tshig ni dman pa'ang min/ /bar ma bar ma'i las rnams la/ /rab tu bsngags par rgyal bas gsungs/ /ha cang mtho min dma' ba min/ /bar mar
rtag tu bzlas pa bya/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /tshig ni dpal dang ldan par gsungs/ /gzhan gyi drung du mi bzlas shing / /gzhan gyi las lam rtag tu gsang / /
bdag nyid rig pa'i yul du bzlas/ /sngags ni bar ma de bzhin du/ /bzlas pas rab tu 'byor bar 'gyur/ /sngags ni legs par thos pa 'ga'/ /dngos grub 'bring bo
'dod pa nyid/ /sngags ni dge bar bzlas par bya/ /de phyir skye bo dang bral bar/ /sngags kyi de nyid don legs thos/ /tshogs dang bral zhing rnam dben par/ /zlos pa pos ni
sngags bzlas bya/ /mtshan mo yi ni bzhi cha dang / /de yi phyed kyi phyed nyid kyi/ /skya reng dmar po'i dus tsam ste/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ba na/ /thun ni dang bor de bzhin du/ /
thub pa'i skyes mchog gis gsungs so/ /dus kyi tshad ni bzhi yin te/ /bar mar yongs su bsgrags pa yin/ /de nas nyi ma phyed nub na/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa de tshe btang / /sngags
zlos bor ba de yi tshe/ /mchod yon phul nas gshegs su gsol/ /brtul zhugs can gyi rnam gzhan spangs/ /de tshe bor ba'i gdugs lhag na/ /
thub pa'i bstan la dge ba bya/ /shes rab pha rol phyin la sogs/ /dam pa'i chos ni klog pa dang / /sa bcu pa ni glegs bam ni/ /mchod dang klog pa rtag tu'o/ /de nas dus la
bab gyur na/ /rang sngags sngags kyi mgon po dang / /thub pa skyes mchog phyag byas nas/ /de nas 'tsho ba la 'gro zhing / /de bzhin dus su spyod par ldan/ /dus su za zhing
dbang po thul/ /sgrub po chos dang ldan pa dang / /sangs rgyas bstan la rab dang brtson/ /grong gzhan du ni 'jug pa na/ /mi smra gtsang spra spyod la dga'/ /sems can rtag tu
chos ldan pa'i/ /khyim du bsod snyoms dag la 'jug /zlos po srog chags med pa'i chu/ /tshos bar grub pa gtsang mar 'dod/ /yang dag lta ba phun sum tshogs/ /sangs
rgyas bstan la rab tu dad/ /de lta'i khyim du rtag tu ni/ /bsod snyoms don du slong mo blang / /dper na brtson pas go bgos te/ /nyam nga'i yul du rab tu 'jug /rtag tu dgra
ni 'joms par byed/ /dgra rnams kyis gzhom mi nus pa/ /de bzhin sngags pa slong mos 'tsho/ /rtag tu grong du 'jug pa na/ /de bzhin chags par 'os pa yi/ /gzugs
sgra mthong nas mi dge ba/ /'dod chags zhi ba'i don gyi phyir/ /mi sdug dge ba bsgom par bya/ /lang tsho'i rnam pas brgyan pa yi/ /bud med lus ni mthong nas kyang / /smad cing rul
ba'i lus rnams ni/ /srin bus zos shing dur khrod gnas/ /lus kyi mi rtag sdug bsngal ba/ /mi gtsang dri mi zhim par bsgom/ /gang la byis pa rmongs pa yi/ /'gro ba lnga por 'gro
zhing 'khor/ /las kyi srad bus brgyus pa ni/ /yun ring dus su mya ngan byed/ /mi shes sgrib pas rmongs pa ni/ /dmus longs sdug bsngal rgyu can no/ /gang du blo ni phyin ci log /
chags pas skye ba phongs par 'gyur/ /rnam pa sna tshogs las lam gyis/ /rnam pa du mar chags gyur pa/ /ring nas khyogs kyis 'gro ba ni/ /'gro dang 'ong ba spyod par byed/ /rtag
pa nyid phyir rjes chags pa/ /'dzin pa'i kun tu spyod pa spyod/ /gang du sems can mi dge dga'/ /lam du yun ring rgyu bar byed/ /zo chun khyud mo'i rnam pa bzhin/ /srid pa'i
mtsho chung 'byung ba rnams/ /'gro ba de rnams mi bzad pa'i/ /sdug bsngal chu bos kun tu g.yengs/ /de bzhin bud med sdug bsngal gyi/ /rtsa ba 'ba' zhig yin pa ru/ /sangs
rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /de bzhin nyan thos rang rgyal dang / /thub pa rnams kyis gsungs pa yin/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho mi 'khrugs pa'i/ /mtsho chen 'di dag bskam par
dka'/ /bud med rnams kyis bslus pa yi/ /sems can gnas gang bying ba de/ /dmyal ba dud 'gro'i 'jig rten dang / /yi dwags 'jig rten lha ma
yin/ /de bzhin mi yi 'jig rten nyid/ /lha yi 'gro bar 'gro bar bya/ /rtag tu kun nas yongs su 'khor/ /bud med chags pas bslus pa ni/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho btson ra yi/ /
'dam rdzab chen por bying bar 'gyur/ /bud med chags pa'i blun po'i mi/ /ro la chags pa'i ce sbyang bzhin/ /gang la sems can rtag dga' ba/ /mi bzad sdug bsngal bzod
par byed/ /dkar po chos la nges par nyams/ /sangs rgyas bstan la rab tu gnas/ /srid pa'i mtsho yi sdug bsngal nyid/ /thams cad zlog par byed pa yin/ /sngags bzlos
pa la dga' zhing brtson/ /dbang chen grags shing yid dang ldan/ /gzi brjid ldan zhing sngags thub pa/ /der rnams la ni sdug bsngal med/ /yang dag sdom dang tshangs
bden shes/ /bla ma lha la mchod pa byed/ /ma dang pha la gus pa rnams/ /gsum po rnams la sdug bsngal med/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal stong pa dang / /gzhan gyi don la
rjes su bsnyen/ /bud med lus la 'byung po'i gzugs/ /de bzhin 'bras dang zug rngu dang / /blo ngan phung po'i lcags kyus zin/ /'khor ba las ni mi 'da' ba/ /rtag tu
bud med chags gyur ba/ /de la dngos grub yod pa min/ /de la mchog 'gro yod ma yin/ /'gro ba 'bring yang yod ma yin/ /dngos grub chung du'ang yod ma yin/ /'dir ni zlos po
khrims 'chal na/ /tshul khrims 'chal la thub dbang gis/ /sngags kyi dngos grub ma bstan no/ /mya ngan 'das grong 'gro ba yi/ /lam yang med cing phyogs dang bral/ /'dir ni byis
pa smad pa la/ /sngags grub pa ni ga la yod/ /skye bo tshul 'chal 'di la ni/ /de la bde 'gro'ang yod ma yin/ /bde ba nyid la gzhol ba'ang med/ /de bzhin rgyal bas gsungs pa'i
sngags/ /grub par 'gyur ba smos ci dgos/ /ta la'i shing gi mgo bo ni/ /gang tshe bcad na slar yang ni/ /sngon po nyid du mi 'gyur zhing / /myu gu slar yang nam zhig 'gyur/ /de bzhin
sngags grub rmongs pa ni/ /chul khrims 'chal zhing sdig pa'i las/ /rtag tu slar yang bud med chags/ /mi dge'i grogs dang phrad pa la/ /sngags kyi rgyal po ga la 'grub/ /de bas
gang tshe zlos pa po/ /bde bar gshegs pas spangs pa yi/ /bud med nyes pa rnams spyad de/ /gang gi dngos grub bsgrub bya ste/ /byis pa bud med la rmongs pa/ /gzhan gyi grub
par ma bstan no/ /de nas dang por blo ldan pa/ /gtsang zhing 'du 'dzi med la dga'/ /rigs ldan brtan zhing dpa' ba dang / /sems bzang ldan zhing mthong na dga'/ /chos
dang chos min rnam dpyod shes/ /de rnams grub pa rnyed mi dka'/ /de ltar sngags shes zhugs pa ni/ /grong du bsod snyoms phyir du 'jug /ji ltar
'dod pa bzhin song nas/ /sngar ni brtags pa'i gnas dag tu/ /mkhas pas dag pa'i blos bza' ba/ /bza' ba phyogs su bzhag nas ni/ /phyi rol song nas rkang pa bkru//
de nas slar yang gnas de ru/ /srog chags med pa'i chu rnams kyis/ /dang po 'dren pa nyid yin te/ /gnyis pa la ni lag g.yon gyi/ /rked pa man chad dril phyis bya/ /kun
tu g.yas pa slar byin nas/ /lag pa sa yis bkru bar bya/ /sngar bzhag pa yi dag pa dang / /gtsang ma rnams kyi bdun nyid du/ /bza' zhing dag chus gtsang sbrar byas/ /ser
skya'i ba las byung ba yi/ /ba yi lci ba ser po dag /gtsang zhing dri med snod blang la/ /srog chags med pa'i chus sbyar te/ /dang por ston pa thub pa yi/ /mchog la dkyil
'khor bya ba yin/ /khyad par khru gang tsam du 'o/ /gnyis pa rang sngags mgon po la/ /gsum pa rigs kyi lha mo la/ /gang zhig sngags pa zlos pa po/ /slar yang rtag
tu bya ba yin/ /bzhi pa sems can thams cad kyi/ /nye bar longs spyod don du grags/ /g.yas su 'jig rten mgon po yi/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ni rtag tu bya/ /dkon
mchog gsum gyi ched du ni/ /dkyil 'khor de ni gru bzhi pa'o/ /gnyis pa rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / /gsum pa stobs bcu ldan pa'i sras/ /dkyil 'khor bdun po 'di
dag ni/ /kun nas gru bzhi pa ru'o/ /khru gang ngam ni khru phyed rung / /nyin re zhing yang bya ba'o/ /zlos pos de tshe sbas pa'i phyogs/ /sdig pa 'joms byed nyin re bzhin/ /de nas sngags
pa thub pa langs/ /lag gnyis 'bad pas bkrus nas ni/ /gtsang ma'i chu yis nye reg bya/ /dag cing srog chags spangs pa yi/ /dri ma med pa'i gtsang ma ni/ /'bad pas
gtsang ma'i snod du blang / /mtsho chen dang ni 'bab chu 'am/ /chu mig chu bo la gnas pa/ /gtsang ma'i phyogs nas byung ba yi/ /sems can gtsang ma lag gis bcus/ /sngags
pas slar yang nye reg bya/ /gnyis sam gsum du rtag tu yang / /de nas kha la reg bya zhing / /de bzhin nyid du rna ba'i rgyun/ /mig dang sna yi bu ga dang / /spyi bo lte ba'i phyogs
reg bya/ /dge ba spyod pas lan lnga'am bdun/ /cho ga bzhin du thams cad bya/ /gtsang sbra'i spyod pa phun sum chogs/ /zlos po gtsang mar gyur nas ni/ /bsod snyoms snod ni
blangs nas su/ /chu yi nang du 'gro bar bya/ /gang du chu bo rab gnas pa/ /de bzhin dma' bar gyur pa dang / /chu klung rab tu 'bab la sogs/ /mi yi 'jig rten rjes gzung
rgyur/ /de bzhin rtag tu sngags bzlas bya/ /de nyid phyir na thub pa'i gtsos/ /brtson 'grus chen pos 'di gsungs so/ /mtshan ni 'od srung zhes bya
bas/ /sngon ni de tshes steng der/ /sgrol ma'i rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir/ /'byung po rnams la legs don du/ /sngags ni rab tu gsungs pa yin/ /sdug bsngal gyur pa'i 'jig
rten kun/ /dbul zhing skyo la sha thang ba/ /mchog tu nyon mongs gyur pa rnams/ /'di rnams don du gsungs pa yin/ /'byung po rnams la legs pa nyid/ /slar yang kun
tu bsten pa rnams/ /'byung po kun gyi zas don du/ /gsang sngags 'di ni mchog tu gsungs/ /nga yis gsang sngags 'di brjod kyi/ /byang sems la bsten thams cad dang / /
nyan thos rnams ni mnyan par gyis/ /nad kyis zin pa 'joms byed cing / /bkres pa'i nad kyis gzir ba dang / /gang yang sems can skom pa dang / /sdug bsngal thams cad
zhi don dang / /'byor pa 'dod rnams mnyan par gyis/ /'od srung 'od ni chen po la/ /thub pa'i gtso bos de skad gsungs/ /nyon mongs rnams ni yid mgu nas/ /khyab
bdag de la gsol ba 'debs/ /chos kyi rgyal po thub pa che/ /chos mkhyen gsang sngags bshad du gsol/ /dam tshig mchog la nyer gnas pa'i/ /sems can rnams
la rjes brtser mdzod/ /de skad gsol nas thub pa yis/ /sngags mchog rgyas par gsung bar byed/ /ka la ping ka sgra dbyangs dang / /rnga bo che dang sprin gyi sgra/ /tshangs dbyangs brtson
'grus chen po dang / /tshangs pa'i sras gang rgyal mchog gis/ /gang yang cung zad 'dir 'ongs pa/ /rkang med pa dang rkang mangs dang / /rkang gnyis pa dang rkang bzhi pa/ /'byung
po'i tshogs rnams kun nyon cig /mdor na sems can don kun tu/ /bde 'byung sngags ni bshad par bya/ /'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi/ /sems can la sogs 'dir lhag
pa/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/ /'byor pa 'dod pa rnams nyon cig /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta sha sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM ga ga ne/ ga ga na/ gany+dzo A nA
ya/ sarba la hu la hu/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ A kaR+Sha Ne/ mA bi lam+ba/ ya the bi taM saM bA dA ya swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis de skad ces gsungs nas cang mi gsung
bar gyur to/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis rig pa'i sngags kyi tshig 'di rgya cher gsungs pa'i bar skabs 'dir nam mkha' thams cad chen po la
'os pa'i zas kyi sprin gyis yongs su gang bar gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi nam mkha'i mthil thams cad zas kyi sprin gyis
rab tu g.yogs par snang bar gyur to/ /bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par 'dod pa'i don du blang par bkru bar bya/ /slar yang de nas langs
nas ni/ /gtsug lag khang ngam gnas su 'gro/ /gang sus sngon ni yang dag bsten/ /gang du gnas pa der 'gro bya/ /song nas zlos pos phyogs de ru/ /lhung bzed de ni
gzhag par bya/ /de nas myur du nye reg bya/ /de bzhin slar yang lhung bzed blang / /lhung bzed sa la lo ma'am/ /dngul lam de bzhin gser nyid dang / /zangs sam
shing shun dag kyang rung / /ston pa la ni lha bshos dbul/ /ston la lha bshos phul nas ni/ /slar yang rang rig sngags rgyal la'o/ /'gron po gcig ni 'ongs gyur
dang / /sdug bsngal can la'ang ci nus sbyin/ /bshos nyid kyang ni thams cad du/ /kun nas nges par bza' ba nyid/ /ha cang mang po sbyin mi bya/ /sngags shes 'dir
ni gdung mi bya/ /kun nas rig pa ldan par bya/ /lto ba'i tshad tsam bzhag nas ni/ /gzhan pa'i zan ni rtag tu'o/ /bkres dang skom pas nyen pa yis/ /sngags don
sgrub par mi nus te/ /ha cang nyung dang mang zos na/ /sngags don bsnyen par mi nus so/ /de nyid phyir na rgyal dbang gis/ /sems can zas kyis gnas so zhes/ /
lus can kun la gsungs pa yin/ /gang gis mi rnams 'tsho ba dang / /lha dang lha min dri za dang / /klu dang gnod sbyin mi 'am ci/ /srin po yi dwags sha za dang / /'byung po skar
ma gza' dag ni/ /gang zhig zas la mi ltos pa/ /de ni 'ga' yang yod ma yin/ /rtag tu kha zas rags pa ni/ /khams kyi zas zhes grags pa'o/ /sems can phra mo'i zas
can spang / /de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ni/ /bsam gtan zas can rtag par ni/ /gzugs ni spyod cing g.yo ba ste/ /gzugs med nyid kyi lha rnams kyang / /ting 'dzin
'bras bu za ba'o/ /srid ba bar ma'i sems can yang / /dri za bar ni rab tu grags/ /de bzhin 'dod khams sems can rnams/ /zas ni rnam pa sna tshogs za/ /'dod dang ldan pa'i
lha dang mi/ /khams kyi zas ni za bar byed/ /de nyid phyir thub dbang gis/ /sems can zas kyis gnas pa zhes/ /chos kyi rgyu ru bstan pa yin/ /gang de rnams ni rab tu grags/ /
zlos po rtag tu brtson pa na/ /zas kyi tshod ni rig par bya/ /gang phyir rig pa bsnyen pa ni/ /zas 'di la ni rab tu gnas/ /kun spyod ma nor dag pa dang / /dge zhing tshangs par
spyod pa dang / /zas kyi tshod kyang shes pa la/ /de yis dngos grub rnyed mi bzang / /dper na khur ni drang ba'i rgyur/ /shing rta yun ring gnas don du/ /shing rta'i mig ni sku dang /
byed/ /de bzhin sngags pa sngags rig pas/ /zas ni gnas ba'i ched du spyad/ /lus ni gso ba'i don du ni/ /zlos po rtag tu gso bar bya/ /sngags
rnams bsgrub pa'i don phyir dang / /byang chub tshogs kyi rgyu yi phyir/ /zas thams cad dang / ji ltar mngon par sred ba'i bza' ba de/ /de rnams su char 'bab bar gyur to/ /
ji ltar mngon par sred pa'i bza' ba de rnams kyis zas kyi bya ba bkres pa'i sdug bsngal zhi ba'i don dang / skom pa rnams kyis btung ba yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i
chu bo'i rgyun lta bu btung bar bya ba'ang yid la 'dod pa bzhin du der bab bar gyur to/ /sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de la bkres pa'i nad thams cad rab tu zhi
ba dang / skom pa thams cad bsal bar byas par gyur to/ /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor thams cad kyang ngo mtshar thob cing chim pa thob nas bcom ldan
'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag btsal nas de nyid du mi snang bar
gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od srung kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas la yongs su bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ngas kyang de'i tshe rtog pa'i
rgyal po'i cho ga 'di la sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa bsal ba'i don gyi phyir dang / khyad par du sngags zlos pa po thams cad kyi phyir
gsungs pa la mngon par rjes su yi rang ngo / /dang po re zhig zlos pa pos sngags 'di bsgrub par bya'o/ /gal te bsod snyoms la 'gro bar mi spro na ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs nas 'bum
phrag bdun bzlas pa bya/ /de nas dkar gsum bza' ba 'am/ 'o ma btung ba'o/ /ri'i rtse mo de nyid du 'phags ma sgrol ma'i ras ris bar ma sngar bzhin du bzhag nas mchod
pa chen po byas te gtor ma dang / lha bshos rgya chen po byas nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis gsungs pa'i gsang sngags 'di nyid kyis seng ldeng gi yam
shing rnams kyi me sbar nas u dum bA ra'i yam shing la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar la btags pa rlan dang bcas pa'am/ dpal 'bras kyi yam shing kyang rung ste stong phrag
brgyad du sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas mtshan phyed kyi dus kyi che sbrin nag po chen po dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'ong bar 'gyur te 'jigs par mi bya/ /langs na 'gro bar yang mi bya'o/ /
bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i snying pos bdag nyid bsrung bar bya zhing dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / grogs rnams kyang sngar bzhin bsrung bar bya'o/ /de nas rlung
nag po'i dkyil 'khor mi snang bar 'gyur te bud med kyang rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ 'od kyi phreng ba dang ldan pas phyogs rnams
kyang kun tu snang bar byed bzhin pa sgrub pa po'i mdun du 'dug ste/ kye kye sems dpa' chen po longs shig /grub po yin no zhes so/ /de nas sgrub pa pos sna ma'i me tog
dang bsres pa'i dri chus mchod yon dbul lo/ /de nas de nyid du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma de nas bdag nyid dam/ 'di'i grogs po nyi shu rtsa lnga la deng nas ji ltar mngon
par 'dod pa'i bza' ba rnams rab tu ster bar byed do/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i yo byad rnams kyang kun tu sbyin par byed do/ /de nas sgrub pa pos mchod yon phul nas gshegs
su gsol bar bya'o/ /ras ris la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas ras ris blangs te sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas de nas ri'i
rtsa mo'am/ mi med pa'i gnas su 'gro bar bya'o/ /der bdag nyid dam/ grogs pos phyag dar byas nas dgram par bya ba rnams bkram la gnas der nam mkha' la 'gro
ba la sogs pa'i las rnams bya'o/ /de nas sgrub pa pos sngar bzhin du ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste ras ris bar ma sngar bzhin du bzhugs su gsol nas seng ldeng
gi shing gi me sbar la thun gsum du pad+ma dkar po'i me tog zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar la btags pa rnams kyis nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig tu rtsa ba'i rig pa'am/ snying po 'am/ nye
ba'i snying pos las chen po thams cad kyi ched du 'am/ yi ge gcig pa'i ched du stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas mtshan phyed kyi dus kyi tshe sbyin sreg gi mthar bcom
ldan 'das ma sgrol ma mngon gsum du mthong bar 'gyur zhing 'dod pa'i mchog gi gnang bar byed do/ /nam mkha' la 'gro ba 'am/ mi snang ba 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i
sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ mngon par shes pa lnga nyid dam/ tshe ring ba nyid dam/ rgyal srid chen po dang / longs spyod chen po nyid kyi ched dam/ rgyal po chen po mnyes
pa nyid dam/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rjes su rnam par spyod pa nyid dam/ mdor na yid la 'dod pa de thams cad gnang bar byed do/ /gang blangs kyang
rung sta de mthun par gnang bar byed cing grub pa'i rdzas rnams thams cad kyang thob bo/ /sems can chen po rnams 'gugs par byed pa 'am/ mdor na ji lta ji ltar zhus
pa de thams cad mdzad de/ /las kyi nyes pa rab tu sbags pa'ang yang dag par sbyong bar byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gsungs so/ /las kyi chog gzhan
pa bar ma'i sgrub thabs su 'gyur ba ni dang po re zhig khyad par gyi gnas sam/ gtsang ma'i phyogs sam/ chu klung ngam/ chu gling gi 'gram du sngar
bzhin du thams cad byas nas ras ris zhal nub tu phyogs par bzhag la bdag nyid kha shar du phyogs pas gnas nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste rgyas par
gong bzhin du sbyar bar bya ste thun gsum du 'bum phrag drug bzlas par bya'o/ /bzlas pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / dong ka'i me tog tsan+dan dkar po dang bsres pa
'am/ gur gum dang bsres pas snga ma de bzhin kho nar me sbar nas stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/ /sbyin sreg gi mthar ras ris 'gul na blon po nyid do/ /ras ris
la 'od kyi snang ba byung na 'od las rgyal srid do/ /ras ris kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs na rgyal po chen po bzhi'i rigs kyi rgyal srid do/ /ras ris la me byung
na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi dbang phyug nyid de brgya byin nyid do/ /ras ris chos ston par byed pa byung na byang chub sems dpa' gsum gyi dbang phyug nyid do/ /ras ris kyi phyag
spyi bor reg na mngon par shes pa lnga dang / sa bdun rjes su thob pa dang / stobs bcu nges pa nyid rim gyis thob par byed pa nyid do/ /de nas sgrub pa pos bcom
ldan 'das 'od srungs kyi gsungs pa'i sngags bsgrub te bkres pa dang / skom pa phyir gzhil ba'i don rjes su thob pa de nyid kyis dang / cho ga de nyid kyis yo byad kyi rig pa'i
spyod pa'i don sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga'i chos la yang dag par nan tan bya yi/ gzhan du grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ltar rim gyis sngags kyi spyod pa la rjes su 'jug cing mdor
na nan tan nges par sgrub par byed de/ rdzas dang / sman dang / yo byad kyi khyad par dang / nor bu rin po che rnams ji ltar sngar nges par bstan pa bzhin du sgrub par
byed do/ /sngags shes sngags ni zlos pa po'ang / /cho ga bshad pa la sems pa/ /sngags pa de tshe de phyogs su/ /gtsang ma'i 'gro bas zas kyang ni/ /zos nas yid ni dga'
pa dang / /dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa dang / /lhung bzed lhag ma rtag blangs te/ /sems bzang chu bo gtsang mar 'gro/ /mtha' gcig tu ni bor nas ni/ /brtul zhugs can
gyis dud 'gro sbyin/ /dud 'gro rnams la mthun byin nas/ /'bad pas lhung bzed bkru bar byed/ /lhag ma lhung bzed bya ba ni/ /snum med zas dang dri bral gang / /lhung bzed lhag
mar thub pas gsungs/ /gang du slong ba'i snod du ni/ /de ru zan ni mi bza' ste/ /der ni bza' ba 'bras bu dang / /rdzas rnams rtag tu bza' mi bya/ /pad 'dab kyis kyang ma
yin te/ /ut+pa la las byung bas sam/ /dri bzang ldan rnams spangs pa ste/ /sngags pas der ni mi bza' 'o/ /gang yang sngags pas ku mu da/ /sla k+Sha
u dum bA ra las byung / /ba Ti'i 'dab ma dang yang ni/ /cher ma'i yal ga'i ri khrod byung / /A mra'i 'dab ma ru yang min/ /de bzhin sA Ta la las byung / /sA la'i 'dab ma
shi ri Sha/ /byang chub shing las byung ba dang / /gang du bcom ldan sangs rgyas ni/ /shAkya seng+ge bzhugs pa yi/ /shing de 'bad pas spang bar bya/ /shing de yi ni yal ga
dang / /nA ga ge sar shing la'ang min/ /gang du nam yang bza' mi bya/ /mkhas pas de kun cis kyang spang / /thub pa'i lo ma'i spyil po ni/ /rmongs pas nam yang 'gom
mi bya/ /sdigs pa dam tshig nyams par 'gyur/ /zas ni lo ma de rnams las/ /gzhan pa'i lo ma rnams su bza'/ /sa byung zangs su nges bstan dang / /de bzhin
gser dang dngul las byung / /shel dang rdo ba las byung ba/ /de bzhin bza' ba blangs nas ni/ /rtag tu sngags pas der ni bza'/ /lo ma'i rgyab tu mi bza' ste/ /de bzhin
lag pa'i mthil du'ang min/ /stobs bcu pa yi sras rnams dang / /rang rgyal bse ru lta bu gang / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos gtso/ /lo ma gzhan dang
lha bshos 'byung / /zlos pos de rnams spang bar bya/ /yi ge rkang pas kyang mi 'gom/ /sna tshogs bza' ba snum khur dang / /de bzhin btung dang bza' ba rnams/ /sngags
pas 'bad pas blang bar bya/ /rgyal dang rgyal ba'i mchog rnams dang / /de bzhin nyan thos skyes bu mchog /dkon mchog gsum la phul ba yi/ /lha bshos thams cad
nyid dang ni/ /zlos pos rtag tu spang bar bya/ /chung ngu tsam yang lus can la/ /sngags rnams de yis mi 'grub ste/ /kun nas bkra shis thams cad dang / /rtag tu dpal ni
smos ci dgos/ /rgyal ba can dang zhi ba can/ /lha bshos gtor ma za byed pa/ /de tshe de yi kun mi 'grub/ /gtsang zhing mkhas la tshul khrims ldan/ /snying rje snying rje'i las
can dang / /gtsang sbra'i spyod pa la dga' ba/ /rig sngags kun tu sgrub par byed/ /sems can gzhan la byin pa'i zas/ /zlos pos de ni bza' mi bya/ /gzhan gyis rab tu
ma brtags pa'i/ /zas gzhan bza' bar mi bya'o/ /rang la byin pas kha zas ni/ /cung zad tsam yang blang bar bya/ /sngags shes de ltar 'jug pa ni/ /de yi dngos grub
sdig pa'i dgra/ /yongs su rdzogs par byed par gnas/ /zlos pos cho ga 'di yis ni/ /bza' ba len pa'i brtul zhugs can/ /thub pa rnams kyis legs par bsngags/ /
sngags rnams thams cad sgrub pa la/ /mdor na cho ga mthong ba yis/ /bza' ba kun dang las rnams la'o/ /de nas gzhan yang rab 'chad byed/ /
sngags ni thams cad sbyong bar byed/ /de nas zlos pos nye reg bya/ /de tshe sngags 'di brjod par bya/ /de tshe sngags pas lan bdun du/ /lus sbyong byed pa bzlas byas
nas/ /'byung po'i tshogs dang lha rnams 'dir/ /de don rgyas pa mnyan par gyis/ /lus kun nye reg byas nas su/ /thub pas sngags 'di brjod par bya/ /na maHsarba
bud d+hA nAM/ A pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM marba kilbi Sh+Ta/ nA sha ni/ nA sha ya/ sarba du Sh+Ta pra yuk+taM/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra hUM dzaHswAhA/ sngags 'dis brlab pa'i
zas gzhan gang yang rung ba yongs su spyod pa na sngags lan bdun mngon par sngags pa byas nas yongs su longs spyod par bya'o/ /zos nas snga ma bzhin du nye reg
byas te spyi bo la sogs pa'i lus thams cad du byug nas de nas ngal bso bar bya'o/ /ngal sos nas yud tsam phyed dam/ thun gcig la'o/ /de nas ras ris dang /
sangs rgyas thams cad la mngon par phyag byas nas dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam bklag par bya'o/ /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'phags
pa zla ba sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'phags pa sa bcu pa dang / 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa dang / 'phags pa rma bya chen mo dang / 'phags pa rin po che tog gi gzungs
te 'di rnams las gzhan dang / gzhan gang yang rung ba bklag par bya'o/ /nyi ma'i dus kyi tshad bzhi cha tsam du'o/ /de nas yongs su zhi nas ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bklag
par bya ste glegs bam brtul nas gos gtsang ma bgos te dam pa'i chos la phyag byas nas de nas khrus kyi ched du chu klung gi 'gram mam/ mtsho phran chen por 'jug pas
song nas srog chags med pa'i sa blangs te lan bdun mngon par sngags par byas nas rig pa 'dis chul gdab bo/ /gang zhe na/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM a pra ti ha ta shA
sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba duSh+Ta staM b+ha ya hUM/ nA dI bar d+hA ri Ne/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra phaT phaT swAhA/ 'dis srung ba byas nas phyogs rnams bcing ba dang / grogs rnams dang /
dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / kha bcing ba dang / gdug pa dang / rab tu gdug pa rnams thams cad 'gugs par byed pa dang / bgegs bcing ba la'ang srad bu la lan bdun
bzlas nas rked pa'i phyogs su bcings pas thams cad yongs su 'chags pa dang / bzlas pa'i dus thams cad dang / khrus kyi dus thams cad dang / gdug pa'i bgegs
rnam par gzhom pa dang / rab tu zhi ba'i don du sngags 'di stong phrag gcig bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas las thams cad byed do/ /pad+ma'i gdan
la phyag rgya chen po dang ldan pa dgod par bya'o/ /las rnams thams cad du thams cad kyi rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas sgrub pa pos sa las byung ba'i phye ma la sogs
pa rnams blangs nas ji ltar bde bar khrus bya zhing srog chags med pa'i chus khrus byas te thams cad du las thams cad la srog chags med pa nyid kyis bya'o/ /de nas
khrus byas nas sa'i rang bzhin nam/ gzhan dri zhim po dang ldan pa'i dri dang / yo byad kyi khyad par gyis rjes su byug par bya'o/ /chu'i nang du mchil ma dang / bshang ba dang /
gci ba la sogs pa'ang dor bar mi bya'o/ /rtse bar yang mi bya'o/ /snying rje dang ldan pas bdag dang / sems can thams cad la so sor brtag par bya ste bdag med pa dang /
stong pa dang / sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dang / sdug bsngal nye bar 'gags pa dang / tshor bas mngon par non pa dang / chu rlabs bzhin du mngon par 'byung ba'i rab tu
sbyor ba'i sdug bsngal dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams 'di ltar sgrub pa dang bral ba sngags shes pas gang de bzhin du dug dang / gcod pa dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par
'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jigs pa la sogs rnams kyis sdug bsngal gyi phung po nye bar 'gog par bya bzhin pa/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thibs po gnas pa'i bdag nyid du mthong
zhing gnas med pa dang / skyob pa med pa dang / skyabs med pa dang / shin tu dman pa'i yid can gyi bdag nyid du brtags nas sgom pa po mgrin pa nub tsam gyi chu na gnas pa'am/
lte ba tsam du gnas pa'i chu de nyid kyi nang du sems rtse gcig tu nye bar gzung bar bya'o/ /dang por re zhig pad+ma chen po'i 'dab ma la me tog chen po dang ldan pa/ pad+ma chen po'i lo
mas nye bar mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ rin po che baiDUR+Ya'i rang bzhin las byung ba'i sdong bu dang / rin po che ma da ka las grub pa'i pad+ma'i ge sar dang / shel las byas pa'i
sdong po legs par kha phye ba dang / de'i rjes su skyes pa'i shel dang / pad+ma rA ga'i me tog rnams kyis mdzes pa'o/ /de'i steng du seng ge'i khri rin po che du mas nye bar mdzes
pa/ ras bcos bu zung gis bkab pa'o/ /de'i stengs su bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsam par bya ste chos ston par mdzad cing bzhugs pa/ gser gyi
mdog tu snang ba/ kun nas 'od 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa/ tshad chen po nam mkha' lta bu mchog tu bris bzhin pa/ skyil mo krung
gi nye bar bzhugs pa/ g.yas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ pad+ma chen po'i gdan
la bzhugs pa/ rnga yab bsnams pa/ bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i grwa na 'khod de lus dmar ser gur gum btags pa'i kha dog lta bu'o/ /g.yon du 'phags pa
mthu chen po thob ston ka'i sprin ltar dkar ba/ phyag na rnga yab thogs pa'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' brgyad la 'phags pa byams pa dang / kun tu bzang po dang /
sa'i snying po dang / nam mkha'i mdzod dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang / 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje dang / nor bzang zhes bya
ba byang chub sems dpa' bcu po 'di rnams kyi g.yas su rang sangs rgyas brgyad bsam par bya ste/ tsan+dan dang / spos ngad ldan dang / tog dang / tog dkar dang / 'dod
pa dang / nye ba'i 'dod pa dang / mu khyud dang / nye ba'i mu khyud brgyad do/ /de nyid du nyan thos chen po brgyad gnas pa la/ 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa maung+ga la gyi bu chen po dang /
'phags pa shA ri'i bu dang / ba lang bdag dang / b+ha ra d+h+wa dza bsod snyoms len dang / pi lin da'i bu dang / 'phags pa sgra gcan zin dang / 'phags pa 'od srung chen
po dang / 'phags pa kun dga' bo zhes pa'i nyan thos chen po de rnams dang nye bar dge slong gi dge 'dun mtha' yas pa bsgom par bya'o/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / nye bar rang
sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa bsgom par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' brgyad po rnams kyi gnas su'ang byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun mtha' yas pa bsgom par bya'o/ /de bzhin
du kun nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang ldan par bsgom par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid kyang lte ba tsam gyi chu la gnas bzhin
du lha dang / mi'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa la me tog man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen po dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma chen po dang / d+hA nu skA ri ka dang / baR+Shi ka dang / in+t+ra ba
rI me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa tshad chen po phung po chen por gnas pa/ ri rab tsam gyi me tog gi phur mas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya zhing 'phags pa nyan thos
dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams dang / lha dang /
mi'i mar me mang po/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag yid du 'ong ba rnams kyis mchod par bya'o/ /de bzhin du gtor ma dang / bdug pa dang / lha bshes dang / mchod pa
dang / bsnyen bkur la sogs pa yo byad lha dang / mi'i nyer mkho rnams dbul bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i smin mtshams kyi
mdzod spu nas 'od zer mngon par 'phro bzhin pas bdag nyid dang / phyogs thams cad kyang kun tu snang bzhin par bsgom par bya'o/ /sgom pa po bsam gtan la zhugs
ma thag tu tshangs pa'i bsod nams kyi 'bras bu thob bo/ /nges par byang chub mchog tu gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /de lta bu sogs bsam gtan rnams/ /'jig rten skyes
mchog rnams kyis gsungs/ /'byung po kun kyang legs pa dang / /sngags pa rnams la phan don dang / /de tshe bsam gtan dang po'i gtso/ /sngags pa kun la phan don
du/ /sems can rnams kyi phyir gsungs so/ /de nas thub mchog bdun pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor rnam par brjod par bya/ /thub pas dang por gsungs pa yin/ /gnyis
pa yi ni dkyil 'khor dang / /gsum par yang ni de las gzhan/ /dang por mchog gi dngos grub ste/ /bar ma la ni de bzhin gzhan/ /chung ngu la ni phran tshogs 'grub/ /
thub pa mchog gis nges par gsungs/ /de bzhin ras ris bsam gtan ni/ /thu bo bar ma chung ngu ste/ /thams cad sdig pa 'jig byed pa'o/ /de las gzhan yang
mkhas pas ni/ /bsam gtan rnam par bsgrub bya/ /bsam gtan de la rab gnas na/ /sngags rnams de la 'grub par 'gyur/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i cho ga bshad/ /zlos pos
bsam gtan bsgoms nas ni/ /sngags kyi mchod yon der phul nas/ /ji ltar bde bar gshegs su gsol/ /chu tshogs de las bsgral nas ni/ /de nas ji ltar bde bar 'gro/ /
gnas ni sngon du nges bstan par/ /cho ga mthong bas legs zhi bar/ /de la sngags pas gsang sngags bzlas/ /sngar las ji ltar brjod pa bzhin/ /rang gi lha ni spyan drangs pa/ /
der ni sngags kyis gshegs su gsol/ /de nas bdag nyid de bzhin nyid/ /grogs po rnams ni bsrungs byas nas/ /dge ba'i las kyis de nyid shes/ /cho ga'i las la dga'
zhing 'dud/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bstod mchod kyis/ /gang zag mchog la kun bstod nas/ /rang sngags sngags kyis mgon po dang / /nyan thos rang rgyal bse ru dang / /byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' che/ /'jig rten gsum po rjes 'dzin bzod/ /de nas gsang sngags zlos pa pos/ /stan de las ni slar langs nas/ /thag ring gnas su song nas ni/ /phyi
rol rlung gi rnam par spangs/ /snabs dang mchil ma rnam par dor/ /bshang dang gci ba'ang de bzhin no/ /nyin par byang du kha phyogs shing / /mtshan mo lho ru kha blta'o/ /sngags
zlos pos ni nam yang der/ /don rnams bsam par mi bya 'o/ /der ni rang las byed gsungs pa'i/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa mi bya 'o/ /rab sngags 'gro
ba mtshan sogs kyi/ /de tshe sa steng nyer 'dug ste/ /dag pa'i chu yis nye reg bya/ /gtsang ma'i gos mtha' chur gzhug bya/ /sa yi phung po bdun nyid kyis/ /'bad pas rkang pa
bkrus byas nas/ /rab tu 'dzag pa bdun blangs nas/ /bshang ba 'dzag pa sum cu ste/ /gnyis ka'i mtha' la lag pa dag /mchil ma dor ba nyid dang ni/ /snabs la'ang
gnyis te de bzhin no/ /de nas 'bad pas nye reg bya/ /gnas la ring du song ba'i sar/ /de bzhin sgra tsam song nas ni/ /lam la sogs pa yangs pa ru/ /de nas
gzhan gyi ci 'dod bzhin/ /lho phyogs mtha' yi phyi rol tu/ /chu dang g.yangs med pa dang / /de bzhin bye mas khyab pa dang / /chu klung spangs shig ngos kyang spangs/ /
'bad pas mi gtsang chu spangs par/ /gsang zhing shin tu sbyangs pa dang / /bas mtha' ljongs ni spangs pa dang / /rnam par dben pa'i sar song nas/ /sngags pas mi
gtsang dor bar bya/ /zlos po dus ni shes byas nas/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i shugs dag min/ /de nas dag pa'i phyogs song ste/ /bas mthar de bzhin ba shang ba dang / /
gci ba'i bya ba byas nas ni/ /de ru lus ni ci bde bar/ /gnyis ka'ang gsang g.yogs sbas pa dang / /skye bo med pa'i sa spang bar/ /gsang sngags rgyal po bsgrub par bya/ /de
bzhin kho nar thams cad du/ /ri bo dang ni tshang tshing dang / /bas mtha'i gnas mal nyams dga' ba/ /de bzhin rgyal bas spangs pa yi/ /gdug pa'i sems can rnams bral bar/ /
gsang sngags rgyal po thams cad sgrub/ /rgyal po chos dang ldan pa'i yul/ /skye bo gtsang sbra spyod la dga'/ /ma dang pha la gus pa dang / /gnyis skyes rigs kyis dor ba ru/ /lha rnams
dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /gnas der yin gyi gzhan du min/ /nyams dga' skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram/ /ya mu na nyid rab mdzes pa/ /sin d+hu nar ma da bak+She/ /zla ba'i cha ni
gtsang ma'i 'gram/ /kA be rA dang dbyangs can nyid/ /chu klung chen po shI ta nyid/ /'di grub zhing gzhan ma yin par/ /stobs bcu ldan sras rnams kyis bshad/ /stobs bcu
pa yis gsungs pa'i phyir/ /byang phyogs lam med ri bo dang / /kha che dang ni rgya yul dang / /bal yul de bzhin mang yul dang / /rgya nag che dang li yul nyid/ /de dag ma lus
grub pa'i zhing / /byang gi phyogs su brten pa yi/ /gang yang ri dang chu bo dang / /bsod nams yul du rab tu brjod/ /nas dang gro ni za ba 'o/ /gang du sems can snying rje ldan/ /de ru
rtag par dngos grub 'gyur/ /dpal gyi ri bo brag ri che/ /lho phyogs yul du gnas pa yi/ /dpal ldan 'bras spung mchod rten ni/ /sa steng rgyal ba'i
ring bsrel 'jin/ /der ni sngags rnams bsgrub par bya/ /myur du las dang las rnams so/ /rdo rje gdan dang mchod rten che/ /chos kyi 'khor lo mdzes pa dang / /gang du thub
gtso zhi bar gshegs/ /der yang dngos grub blta bar bya/ /lha las babs pa'i mchod rten ni/ /sa pak+She dang cho 'phrul che/ /ser skya zhes bya'i grong mchog dang / /lum bi'i
tshal du 'khrungs pa der/ /gsang sngags rgyal po 'grub par 'gyur/ /rgyal bas bstod cing rab bsngags pa'i/ /bya rgod phung por ri der dang / /de bzhin brag dang bsir ba'i
tshal/ /me tog ces bya'i grong mchog dang / /de bzhin rtag tu ka sha'i grong / /bcom brlags ka n+ya kub dzi dang / /sa steng grong ni 'phags rgyal dang / /mchod rten de bzhin
yangs pa can/ /rtag tu sa steng mi thi la/ /grong dang grong khyer gtso bo rnams/ /gang gzhan rgyal ba yang dag 'byung / /rab bsngags bsod nams yul dag tu/ /de rnams
su ni dngos grub sgrub/ /'di rnams las gzhan yul rnams ni/ /grong dang ljongs dang ri bo dang / /gnas dang grong mchog gtso bo ni/ /'o ma'am 'bab chu la bsten
pa/ /der ni rnam dben rjes 'jug cing / /bzlas dang sbyin sreg dga' bar 'gyur/ /gnas ni bla gab med pa dang / /rtag tu khang pa stong pa ru/ /sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba 'o/ /sngags rnams
rjes mthun las rnams ni/ /sngags pas rtag tu yul dbus su/ /sngags bzlas yang dag 'dod par bya/ /bzlas la rab zhugs rtag tu brtson/ /sngags rig gtong ba dag la goms/
tshul khrims spyod cing shin tu brtan/ /'byung po kun la phan par dga'/ /sngags kyi spyod pa la dad pa/ /brtul zhugs can gyis sngar bzhin bzlas/ /gtsang ma'i yul dang gtsang sbra
can/ /kla klo rkun ma spangs pa dang / /der ni bskal pa chen por gnas/ /dam tshig snang ba bral ba'i phyir/ /dmyal ba mi bzad mun pa ru/ /byis pa'i skye bo 'tshed par byed/ /dam pa'i
chos la smad pa dang / /mi shes mun pas bsgribs pa dang / /ye shes byis pa'i ngo bo 'am/ /rmongs pa log pa'i nga rgyal can/ /rig pa'i rgyal po brnyas byed pa/ /mi bzad dmyal
bar ltung bar 'gyur/ /de phyir sdig pa mi bya zhing / /log par smra ba'ang smad pa yin/ /dam pa'i chos la brnyas pa dang / /log par lta ba smad pa yin/ /de phyir rtag tu dad gyur
nas/ /gsang sngags cho ga rtag tu bsten/ /bden par smra zhing chos shes pa/ /sems can rnams la rtag tu phan/ /sngags shes sngags ni sten par byed/ /de yi dngos grub
nges par 'gyur/ /mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma yis/ /las ni rnam pa sna tshogs byed/ /las rnams bya ba rnams kyis byed/ /rtag tu phan pa'i bya ba yis/ /
bya ba'i las dang yang dag ldan/ /de la rtag tu grub par 'gyur/ /bya ba'i don dang don kun phyir/ /las don rtag tu bya ba 'o/ /bya ba'i don du bya min gang / /bya ba'i las la sbyar
bar bya/ /'bras bcas nyid kyi bya don gyi/ /bya ba nyid du rtag tu bya/ /bya ba las dang 'bras bu nyid/ /bya ba las 'bras rtag tu 'o/ /'bras med 'bras bu nyid 'gyur zhing / /'bras
bu nyid kyang rtag tu 'bras/ /'bras med 'bras bu bcas pa nyid/ /thams cad nyid kyang 'bras bu bcas/ /rnal 'byor sngags ni bsgrub bya ste/ /yang dag sbyor dang bral ba yang / /
bral dang yang dag ldan sgrub bo/ /bsgrub bya sgrub byed med par ni/ /de la grub pa yod ma yin/ /grub pa'i rdzas ni thams cad kyang / /grub pa'i rgyu dang 'gal ba yin/ /sngags kyi
dngos grub ma grub pa/ /sngags ni sgrub par byed pa'i rgyu/ /byed par 'dod pa de las te/ /'dod pa'i las ni byang bar 'gyur/ /las min las ni thams cad la/ /las kyi rgyud
ni mi bya'o/ /sngags dang rgyud kyi don ldan pa'i/ /las ni mtha' dag brtsam par bya/ /brtsams dang rtsom pa'i 'dud pa yi/ /las nyid brtsam par mi bya'o/ /bya ba ma brtsams
sngags rnams ni/ /lus can kun la 'grub mi 'gyur/ /sems can kun rjes skyong ba yi/ /thub pa'i gtso bos sngon gsungs pa/ /gsang sngags smra bas bstan pa yi/ /rgyal ba'i sras
kyi yang dag sdom/ /sgrub bo sngags ni kun shes shing / /rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di la tshig /sngags kyi tshul gyis bstan pa yin/ /lam ni byang chub rgyur gyur pa/ /sngags kun nyid ni sgrub
bar byed/ /rig pa mnyam par 'gyur ba yin/ /de ni ring por mi thogs par/ /mkhas pas dngos grub 'gyur ba yin/ /'byung po thams cad zhi don du/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu
bsgrags/ /gsang sngags tshul gyi lam 'dis ni/ /mya ngan 'das grong 'gro ba yi/ /de bzhin rtag tu byang chub lam/ /chos don thams cad rdzogs par byed/ /de yi mthar thug dpung
gnyen ni/ /dang po gnas ni sangs rgyas nyid/ /de bzhin 'dir ni lhun grub tu/ /'bras bur bcas pa'i dngos grub thob/ /sna tshogs las dang chos shes pa/ /sngags rnams byed
par 'gyur ba yin/ /tshul khrims bsam gtan rnam thar rnams/ /'di rnams mdor bsdus thob pa yin/ /dngos grub don kun sgrub byed pa/ /rgyal ba gtso bos gsungs pa yin/ /
gang zag rkang pa'i don thob pa/ /dam pa'i 'gro bar gnas pa dang / /de bzhin rtag tu gnod sbyin gtso/ /tha mas rgyal srid rgyu yin te/ /lha min lha yi 'jig rten gyi/ /de bzhin
de rnams bdag po ni/ /sngags pas thams cad thob par 'gyur/ /bya ba 'bras bcas byed par 'gyur/ /gtsang sbra'i kun spyod yang dag ldan/ /tshul
khrims bsam gtan rtag tu dga'/ /sngags rnams kun tu gsungs pa yin/ /de nas sngags pas sngags bzlas bya/ /sngags pa 'byor pa 'dod pa yis/ /rnam pa sna tshogs las
byas te/ /de bzhin mchog dang bar ma dang / /tha ma nyid kyang bya ba yin/ /tha mas longs spyod 'phel ba yin/ /bar mas gong ma'i lus can nyid/ /mchog nyid kyis ni ldang ba
nyid/ /zlos pos rtag tu thob par byed/ /sngags pas bzlas mthar ngal bso zhing / /ji srid dus su brtag par bya/ /bzlas pa'i dus la bab pa na/ /der ni bsgrub pa bya ba yin/ /de
bzhin las rnams sgrub par byed/ /de la rtag tu bzlas pas skyes bu rang gi sdig pa zad par byed do/ /sngags pas sngon las kyi cho ga gang byas pa skye ba brgyud pa rnams su grub par
gnas pa de de bzhin du las tshogs la rnyed par 'gyur ba de skyes pas sngags bzlas pas slar yang sngags zlos pa po'i sdig pa zad pa'i don dang / las de 'joms shing
sngags grub par 'gyur te de bzhin du mchog dang / bar ma dang / tha ma'i 'jig rten gyi mchod pa dang / bzlas pas sdig pa ma lus par zad par byed cing skye ba brgyud pa
rnams su gang bar byas/ sdig pa de thams cad 'jig par byed de de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngags bzlas pas lus rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / thub pa rnams
kyis gnas pas dga' ba dang / yon tan thams cad kyis grags par 'gyur ba dang / gnod sbyin gyi khang par gnas pa'i rgyal po nyid dang / rtag tu don thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang
thob pa dang ldan no/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen mdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa las/
ras ris bar ma'i cho ga rab 'byams dgu pa rdzogs so// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs
nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po/ khyod nyon cig /khyod kyi rig pa'i sngags
rjes su spyod pa/ sems can mtha' dag gi don la brtson pa/ sems can rnams gang gis bzlas par bya ba'i rig pa'i sngags dang / gang dang ldan pas bgrang bar bya ba'i bgrang phreng
gi cho ga /rgyud thams cad kyi thun mong gi sgrubs thabs kyi cho ga /sngags thams cad kyi cho ga de legs par nyon la legs par yid la zungs shig /bshad par bya'o/ /de skad ces
bka' stsal pa dang / sems dpa' chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ legs so/ /legs so/ /bcom
ldan 'das/ bdag cag la rjes su brtse bas nye bar blangs nas rig pa'i sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa dang / dam tshig la rab tu zhugs pa'i sems can rnams dang / sems
can thams cad la don gyi phyir yang de bka' stsal du gsol/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sems dpa' chen po rnam par dbye ba rgyas par bshad par bya'o/ /nyon cig /gang gis sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa la mngon par
brtson pa/ sems can gyi don thams cad sgrub par byed pa de gang zhe na/ dang po re zhig sngags su 'gyur ba ni/ /na maHsarba bud d+hAM nAM/ a tsin+t+ya d+b+hU ta/ ru pi nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM ku ru ku
ru sarba ar+tha sA d+hA ya/ sarba duSh+Ta bi mo ha ni/ ga ga nA ba laM be/ bi sho d+ha ya swAhA/ rig pa 'dis bgrang phreng thams cad la las bya'o/ /sbyang ba dang / dbugs pa dang / blang ba dang /
rgyu ba la sogs pa'i las rnams bya'o/ /dang po bgrang phreng shing la ni/ /lan grangs sum cu rtsa bdun du/ /de yis mngon par sngags byas nas/ /brtul zhugs can gyis bsrung
ba bya/ /mtshan mo gcig tu gnyid log nas/ /der ni rmi lam brtag par bya/ /mi ma yin gzugs kun rdzogs pa/ /mi sdug lhag par mche ba gtsigs/ /sngags pa la ni des smras pa//
bcom ldan sems pa ji bzhin longs/ /sgrub po tho rangs langs nas ni/ /shing de ru ni 'gro bar byed/ /mi sdug gzugs ldan gtsigs pa che/ /rmi lam du yang ma mthong na/ /sngags pas
shing de bor bar bya/ /de nas gzhan du 'gro bar gyis/ /dang po ru rak+Sha yin te/ /de la gzhan pa dbang po'i shing / /bo de tse ni 'dod pa 'o/ /gzhan yang 'bras bu 'byung ba yi/ /shing la
'dzegs pa'i legs rdzogs pa'i/ /grogs dang lhan cig 'dzeg par bya/ /grogs po med par gyur na ni/ /rang nyid de la 'dzeg par bya/ /steng gi yal ga'i 'bras gnas su/ /'dzeg
nas phun tshogs brtul zhugs can/ /de la rtag tu bag yod pas/ /steng gi yal ga'i 'bras bu blangs/ /steng gi sa la legs sbyar bya/ /steng gi mchog gi dngos grub tu/ /gang zag
mchog gis gsungs pa yin/ /bar mar dngos grub 'bring po ste/ /tha ma la ni 'og ma 'o/ /srog chags rnams kyis ma smad pa'i/ /'bras bu de rnams yang dag blangs/ /nub kyi yal
ga las thob pa/ /rdzas kyi rgyur ni bsgrub par bya/ /byang gi gnod sbyin mo la sogs/ /lha rnams lhan cig 'gugs par byed/ /dgug pa'i bya ba bshad pa ni/ /kun gyi don du zhi
phyir ro/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed dang / /mi 'am ci dang srin po rnams/ /'dod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed/ /'byung po thams cad rgyas pa'i phyir/ /
'bras bu dang bcas las rnams ni/ /ma lus spyod pa byed pa 'o/ /shar gyi phyogs su yal ga dang / /der gnas 'bras bu 'byung ba rnams/ /de bzhin 'bad pas byas gyur na/ /
tshe ring po yi don gyi rgyu/ /rtag tu sngags kyis dngos grub 'bras/ /rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa yin/ /gang zhig lhor ni 'gro ba yi/ /yal ga lo mar rab ldan pa/ /sems can rnams
kyi srog 'phrog byed/ /de na zlos pos 'bad pas spang / /lho ru rten pa'i yal ga la/ /'bras bu gang du yang dag brjod/ /phyogs der gdung dbye dgra rnams kyi/ /srog ni 'jig
par byed pa yi/ /bsod nams ma yin mang po'i rgyu/ /de ni zlos pos 'bad pas spang / /'og tu 'phyang ba'i yal gar gnas/ /'bras bu gang zhig rab bsgrags pa/ /lha ma yin
dang ldan pa yi/ /sa yi 'og tu de rnams 'gro/ /de rnams 'bras bcas phreng ba ni/ /blangs nas yang dag rab bsgrags pa/ /'og tu 'gro ba'i 'khri shing la/ /de nas de ni sa 'og
'gro/ /de ru rab tu zhugs nas lha'i/ /bde nyid zlos pos der 'gyur ro/ /lha min bu mos yang dag ldan/ /de ni bskal par gnas par byed/ /bgrang phreng 'bras bu kun
blangs nas/ /de nas zlos pos bzlas pa bya/ /lhan cig srung ba byas nas ni/ /de nas ji ltar bde bar 'gro/ /de nyid ring po'i gnas su ni/ /gtsang ma'i phyogs der sngags pa ni/ /de bzhin
rtag tu 'dug par bya/ /bgrang phreng skyes pa sbyar bar bya/ /brtson pas bgrang phreng 'bras bu blang / /de nas kun tu yang dag sbyang / /der ni phreng ba dbugs par grags/ /gsum bdun
brgyad dang gcig dang ni/ /lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu/ /sngags shes der ni sbyang bar bya/ /rtag tu snga ma'i sngags kyis ni/ /brgyad dam bdun du bzlas byas pa/ /de nas de ni dag
par 'dod/ /pad+ma'i rtsa lag legs brjod pas/ /bu mos bkal ba'i srad bu yis/ /sum 'gyur lnga dang ldan pa yi/ /brtul zhugs can gyis phreng thag bya/ /sngags kyi de nyid shes
pas brgyu/ /'bras bu phra mo zlum par bcas/ /rtag tu srog chags bug med/ /yan lag ma nyams ma smad pa/ /mdzes shing kha dog sdug pa dang / /bu ga med cing gas pa med/ /
ril bu zlum po ji bzhin pa/ /de bzhin ru rak+Sha dang ni/ /bo de tse dang in+ta k+Sha/ /'bras nyid rtag tu lung thang mdzes/ /'bras bu dam pa'am gang gi tshe/ /sngags pa mchog tu brtson pa
yis/ /'bad pas bgrang phreng brgyu bar bya/ /gser ram yang na dngul dag gam/ /nor bu shel las byung ba dang / /mu tig dung nyid mu sa ra/ /byu ru yis kyang bya ba ste/ /phreng ba
rnam pa sna tshogs bya/ /gzhan yang rin chen las byung ba'i/ /bgrang phreng bzang po bya ba dang / /sa las byung ba'i ldum po yi/ /ril bus bgrang phreng
can dag ni/ /mnyam par bzhag ste srad bu brgyu/ /gzhan yang ril bu 'ga' zhig gam/ /'bras bu'am khams las byung ba yis/ /ku sha'i rtse mos brgyus pa yang / /zlos
pos 'bad de bya ba yin/ /brgya rtsa brgyad dam nyi shu lnga/ /lnga bcu 'di dag bar ma yin/ /sngags pa mnyam par gzhag pa yis/ /'bras bu'i tshad rnams brgyu bar bya/ /
stong rtsa brgyad pa nyid bya ba/ /phreng ba 'di ni thu bo yin/ /phreng ba rnam pa 'di bzhi ni/ /sngags pas rtag tu brgyu bar bya/ /de nas rgyus te sngags rnams ni/ /phyi mo gsum ma ma
gnyis nyid dang / /rgya lcags las byung gdu bu dang / /de bzhin gser dang dngul dag dang / /de nas zangs byung gdu bus kyang / /phreng ba kun nas brgyur ba bya/ /de nas mtha'
ru yang mi bya/ /de la rim gyis dgod par bya/ /'bad pas mdzes par dkri ba bya/ /sangs rgyas ma lus bzhugs par ni/ /yongs su gsal bar byas de nas/ /dkyil 'khor
lta bur mthong ba yin/ /sbrul gyi gdengs ka'i rnam pa bzhin/ /yongs su dkris pas brgyan pa yin/ /mu tig do shal rnams mtshungs shing / /mgul rgyan rnam par sprul
pa'o/ /de nas 'bab chu dge ba'i mthar/ /dri ma med la khrus byas nas/ /go rims ji bzhin khrus byas te/ /chu yi gnas la ldang bar bya/ /de bzhin brtson pas nye reg bya/ /bgrang phreng
srad bu blangs nas ni/ /ba yi rnam lngas rab byung bya/ /sa yi phye mas rab bkrus nas/ /gtsang ma'i gos la dri bzang gis/ /rjes su nye bar byugs pa dang / /rab tu bsngags pa'i kha dog
kyang / /tsan+dan dkar po gur gum dang / /'bad pas dron mos bkru bar bya/ /de bzhin gnyis ka 'gro bar 'gyur/ /ji lta'i gnas su song nas ni/ /gang du ras ris bar pa ni/ /rgyal mchog
thub pa'i gtso bo ni/ /shAkya seng ge mi yi mchog /ston pa'i gzugs brnyan de bzhin du/ /sa steng rgyal ba'i ring bsrel can/ /mchod pa de yi spyan sngar dgod/ /de dang nye bar bzhag
nas ni/ /de tshe de'i spyan snga ru/ /dam tshig la gnas stong rtsa brgyad/ /son pa'am brgya yang gcig tu ni/ /brgyad dang bcas pa bzlas byas nas/ /nyin mtshan smyung bar gnas
gyur nas/ /bdun pa bskul ba phreng ba dbul/ /snga ma de bzhin bzlas bya ba/ /tshad nyid de dang mnyam par bya/ /de nas phreng ba yongs su bzlas/ /mtshan mo de nyid du 'khod de/ /ku
sha bting ba'i sa gzhi la/ /sngags shes der ni nyal bar bya/ /rmi lam gang dang gang mthong ba/ /dge ba'i rmi lam mthong nas/ /rmi lam nges par bstan pa yi/ /dngos grub de
yis bsgrub par bya/ /sangs rgyas nyan thos bse ru rnams/ /gal te rmi lam mthong gyur na/ /sngags pas 'bras bu bcas par 'grub/ /nges bar de yi
cho ga bya/ /dge slong gzugs dang bram ze yi/ /gzugs brnyan sna tshogs mdzes pa mthong / /gal te rmi lam de mthong na/ /phreng ba dbul bya de bzhin du/ /sngags kyi don kun
sgrub pa po/ /de bzhin gdon mi za bar 'grub/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma
ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa las ras ris bar ma'i cho ga rab 'byams las/ bcu pa bgrang phreng gi cho ga'i le'u rab 'byams rdzogs so// //de nas
yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas slar yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la gzigs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan
ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po/ khyod kyi rig pa'i sngags kyi le'u rdzogs pa'i khyad par gyi cho ga dang / sbyin sreg gi las rab tu
sbyor ba'i rig pa'i sgrub pa yod de me la nye bar spyod pa'i khyad par gyi cho ga las gang du rig pa'i spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa'i sems can rnams rab tu sbyor zhing gnas
par 'gyur ba de gang zhe na/ rig pa'i sngags kyi tshogs gsang chen ni/ tad+ya thA/ oM tiSh+Tha ha ri ping+ga le/ hi rak+Sha di hi da dA 'di pA ya hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
'di ni mchog gi snying po las thams cad byed pa/ 'dod pa thams cad ster ba'o/ /dang po re zhig sgrub pa pos me'i snying po 'di lan gcig bzlas pas mar gyi sreg blugs
gsum me la sbyin sreg bya ste me lha spyan drangs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du rab tu sbyar te zhi ba can dang / rgyas pa can dang / drag po'i las rnams la yam shing rnam pa gsum
du 'gyur ro/ /mya ngan med shing zhi don du/ /khyad par brlan dang bcas pa nyid/ /mtho gang ngam ni khru gang tsam/ /sor mo gsum du'ang mtho ba yi/ /snam pa'i rnam pa rab tu shes/ /
cho ga 'di ni bya ba yin/ /bu ga med cing ser ga med/ /de bzhin ne tso'i gshog pa 'dra/ /ljang dang dkar ba'i kha dog gam/ /kha dog nag po spang bar bya/ /srin bu rnams kyis
zos pa spang / /bu ga med pa'ang yang dag sbyin/ /gzhan yang kha dog mchog min pa/ /tha ma'i chos kyang spangs pa'o/ /de rnams skam dang rlon pa'ang yin/ /de yi tshe yang brtsam
par bya/ /ma rul yon po min nyid dang / /shin tu ring ba'ang spang par bya/ /de nas me thab byas nas ni/ /kun nas zur ni bzhi pa ru/ /'og nyid du ni 'bad pas brko/ /khru bzhi pa
yi tshad dang ni/ /khru gsum khru ni gnyis pa dang / /de bzhin nyid du khru gcig ba/ /rtag tu srog chags spangs pa dang / /bye mas legs par
sbyar ba de/ /de nas pad 'dra'i kha khyer ni/ /kun nas dkyil 'khor rnam pa'o/ /yang na 'bad pas zur bzhi pa/ /'dab ma gsum du bya ba 'o/ /zhi ba can dang rgyas pa
can/ /'di yang yang dag bsgrags pa yin/ /mngon spyod la ni sa dbus su/ /rdo rje bya zhing rtse gnyis su/ /rtse mo gsum du bya ba yin/ /me thab rgya la khru gnyis re/ /gtsang
ma'i phyogs su de bzhin bdar/ /chu klung 'gram du de bzhin spyad/ /bstan pa gcig gi phyogs rnams dang / /dur khrod khang pa stong pa ru/ /sbyin sreg legs par brtsam
par bya/ /de bzhin ri bo'i rtse nyid dang / /rtag tu lha khang stong pa dang / /de bzhin nyid du dgon pa che/ /gang yang sgrub pa'i phyogs rnams ni/ /gang zag mchog gis gsungs
pa dang / /sbyin sreg las ni thams cad la/ /de rnams gnas su gsungs pa yin/ /khru gang tshad du gnas pa yi/ /ku sha'i khres la nyer 'dug nas/ /der ni sngags
shes khyad par du/ /sbyin sreg gi ni las bya 'o/ /gnas de nyid du rab gnas pas/ /myur du dngos grub the tshom med/ /shar dang byang du kha phyogs pas/ /zhi ba can
dang rgyas pa bya/ /lho ru drag po'i las rnams te/ /de ni sngags pas spang par bya/ /shar bltas zhi ba'i dngos grub ste/ /rgyas pa can yang byang du phyogs/ /de yis sngags ni
dus rtag tu/ /rig pa'i bzlas pa brtsam par bya/ /bil ba arga sla k+Sha dang / /n+ya gro d+ha yis rgyas las bya/ /mngon spyod shing ni skam po dang / /tsha ba skyur dang rnon po rnams/ /de
dag thams cad spang bya ste/ /thub pa rnams kyis rtag tu bkag /zhi ba can dang rgyas pa can/ /rlon pa'i shing gis rab tu shis/ /de bzhin drag las la shing skam/ /tshwa ba
skyur dang rnon po rnams/ /yam shing de rnams med na ni/ /shing la de rnams su brtag bya/ /rtse mo gnyis su brtag pa bya/ /sngo dang snum dang 'dra ba dang / /rma bya'i mgrin pa dang
mtshungs pa'i/ /rnam pa de lta'i ku sha yis/ /kho ra yug tu ku sha ni/ /rtag tu 'gram par bya ba ni/ /zhi ba can dang rgyas pa can/ /mar gad dang ni mtshungs pas so/ /de bzhin
rtag tu skam po'i rtsis/ /sdig pa'i las ni bya ba ste/ /'dir ni rgyal ba mchog gis bkag /dri med chu ni dag pa la/ /rtag tu srin bus spangs pa yi/ /de nas kun nas
bsang gtor bya/ /g.yas phyogs su ni bskor byas te/ /brtson pas me ni sbar bar bya/ /cho ga ji bzhin nye reg bya/ /gtsang ma'i rtswa yi rtsa ba yis/ /sgron me tshad dang ldan
byas nas/ /de nas khu tshur brtsams byas nas/ /'bad pas me ni sbar bar bya/ /kha yi rlung gis mi bya ste/ /rtag tu gos kyi mthas kyang min/ /
sham thabs bla gos mngon par spang / /gos gzhan gyis kyang lag pa yi/ /rlung gis nye bar gzhom pa la/ /mngon par dga' bas ma yin no/ /gtsang ma'i rlung yab de
bzhin gos/ /nor bus kyang ni rlung yang bya/ /rlung ni yang dag 'byung ba 'dis/ /me ni mnyam par byas pa la/ /sngags shes pas ni me sber bya'o/ /sbyin sreg don du
mnyam gzhag pas/ /de nas g.yas pa min pa yis/ /der ni bsang gtor byas nas ni/ /der ni ba yi mar gyis ni/ /sreg blugs gsum ni sbyin par bya/ /de nas
kyang ni phyag bya ste/ /sangs rgyas kun dang skyob pa dang / /rang sngags sngags kyi mgon po la/ /de nas ci 'dod phyag bya 'o/ /de tshe me yi snying po yi/ /sngags ni lan brgya
bzlas pa yis/ /brtson ldan dri zhim me tog gis/ /rtag tu me ni spyan drang bya/ /sngags shes rtag tu spyan drangs nas/ /gnas la mkhas pas gdan dang gnas/ /sngags
des dbul zhing gzhan gyis min/ /zho dang mang du bsres pa dang / /sbrang rtsi btags pa'i yam shing ni/ /de las lan gsum sbyin sreg bya/ /rgyas pa'i don du
